channel.title: About on Alexandre Fernandez

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Ph.D student at Université Paris-Est Créteil (France). Currently finishing my thesis at Laboratoire d’Algorithmique, Complexité et Logique (LACL) under the supervivision of Luidnel Maignan and Antoine Spicher. Teaching this year at Faculté des sciences et technologies. Before that I was teaching at IUT Sénart-Fontainebleau while doing my Ph.D. As a student I have done a research internship at Laboratoire d’Informatique de Paris 6 (LIP6) in the team Complex Networks.
